Uses of Class
org.getspout.spoutapi.particle.Particle

  • Packages that use Particle 
    Package Description
    org.getspout.spoutapi.packet
    This package provides the implementation of all SpoutPlugin packets that are sent to the client
    org.getspout.spoutapi.particle  

    • Uses of Particle in org.getspout.spoutapi.packet

      Constructors in org.getspout.spoutapi.packet with parameters of type Particle 
      Constructor and Description
      PacketParticle(Particle p) 

    • Uses of Particle in org.getspout.spoutapi.particle

      Methods in org.getspout.spoutapi.particle that return Particle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Particle Particle.setAmount(int amount) 
      Particle Particle.setGravity(float gravity)
      Sets the gravity modifier for the particle (0 = no gravity)
      Particle Particle.setMaxAge(int maxAge)
      Sets the maximum age (in ticks) that the particle will last
      Particle Particle.setMotion(Vector motion)
      Sets the direction of motion for this particle
      Particle Particle.setParticleBlue(float particleBlue)
      Sets the blue color for the particle, or -1 if it uses the default color.
      Particle Particle.setParticleGreen(float particleGreen)
      Gets the green color for the particle, or -1 if it uses the default color.
      Particle Particle.setParticleRed(float particleRed)
      Sets the red color for the particle, or -1 if it uses the default color.
      Particle Particle.setRange(double range)
      Sets the range this particle will be visible at Client graphics settings may override this
      Particle Particle.setScale(float scale)
      Sets the scale of the particle
